episode.title: ‘Star Wars: The Last Jedi’ Holiday Spectacular

episode.description: As per holiday tradition at The Talk Show, a brief chat about ‘Star Wars: The Last Jedi’, with a cavalcade of special guests, including Guy English and John Siracusa.
